response.overview: Du Lan Xi, a participant in game development, entered the beta version of the game "Super Time Love" and received a task to help the character become the queen mother. Only after completing the task can she return to the original world. Then, the game was accidentally invaded by a virus, and Du Lan Xi and Emperor Qi Yu were in love with each other in the process of fighting the virus together. After solving the crisis, Du Lan Xi chose to stay in the game and spend time with Qi Yu.
response.title: Am I the Queen Mother Today
